summary: Redesigned About page hero section to match modern, professional style of Collaboration page. Updated layout with better spacing (1.15fr:0.85fr ratio), refined typography (text-4xl to text-[3.5rem]), enhanced CTA buttons with ArrowRight icons and hover animations, improved image presentation with gradients and shadows, decorative accent elements, and mobile-first responsive design. Added ArrowRight import. Restored App.tsx from git. Build successful.
current_status: About page hero redesigned with modern, professional styling. Matches Collaboration page design language. Build successful. Ready for testing.
